title: VisualState setters should support custom attached properties
body: The VisualStateManager ignores Visual State Setters using custom attached properties. This works with normal attached properties, so it's confusing that it doesn't work for custom ones. The hack to get this to work is really ugly and requires custom code for every case using reflection: https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/expression/en-US/0f9826e1-48d2-4cd7-8253-a5b9aaf0e03d/uwpadaptative-triggers-with-custom-attached-properties-in-windows-10-uwp

comments.body: Would love for a syntax like that to be able to work on UWP :
